name: Rossignol BC X11 75mm Boots - Unisex
description: Full days of touring with happy feet. The BC X11 is lightly  insulated and thermo-mouldable so you get warmth and feel of a custom-fit boot. The hinged external cuff delivers stability, power, and control for full days of touring.Upper cuff is anatomically shaped 3D carbon for increased lateral and fore/aft stability and maximum power transmission.PVC lower cuffs with plastic heel reinforcements fend off edge cuts.Durable Cordura covers the laces to shed snow and ice.Thermo-mouldable liners add extra comfort to your fit.3M Thinsulate™ insulation keeps you feet warm.BC 75 sole.
